00140 //Using the ESC key in the PBI will get rid of the PBI and go back to mapscreen, but 
00141 //only if the PBI isn't persistant (!gfPersistantPBI).
00142 BOOLEAN gfPersistantPBI = FALSE;
00143 
00144 //Contains general information about the type of encounter the player is faced with.  This
00145 //determines whether or not you can autoresolve the battle or even retreat.  This code
00146 //dictates the header that is used at the top of the PBI.
00147 UINT8 gubEnemyEncounterCode = NO_ENCOUNTER_CODE;
00148 
00149 //The autoresolve during tactical battle option needs more detailed information than the 
00150 //gubEnemyEncounterCode can provide.  The explicit version contains possibly unique codes
00151 //for reasons not normally used in the PBI.  For example, if we were fighting the enemy
00152 //in a normal situation, then shot at a civilian, the civilians associated with the victim
00153 //would turn hostile, which would disable the ability to autoresolve the battle.
00154 BOOLEAN gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode = NO_ENCOUNTER_CODE;
00155 
00156 //Location of the current battle (determines where the animated icon is blitted) and if the
00157 //icon is to be blitted.
00158 BOOLEAN gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = FALSE;

00180 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00181 //The group is passed so we can extract the sector location
00182 void ValidateAndCorrectInBattleCounters( GROUP *pLocGroup )
00183 {
00184       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00185       GROUP *pGroup;
00186       UINT8 ubSectorID;
00187       UINT8 ubInvalidGroups = 0;
00188 
00189       if( !pLocGroup->ubSectorZ )
00190       {
00191             pGroup = gpGroupList;
00192             while( pGroup )
00193             {
00194                   if( !pGroup->fPlayer )
00195                   {
00196                         if( pGroup->ubSectorX == pLocGroup->ubSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == pLocGroup->ubSectorY )
00197                         {
00198                               if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle || pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle || pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle )
00199                               {
00200                                     ubInvalidGroups++;
00201                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle = 0;
00202                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle = 0;
00203                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle = 0;
00204                               }
00205                         }
00206                   }
00207                   pGroup = pGroup->next;
00208             }
00209       }
00210 
00211       ubSectorID = (UINT8)SECTOR( pLocGroup->ubSectorX, pLocGroup->ubSectorY );
00212       pSector = &SectorInfo[ ubSectorID ];
00213 
00214       if( ubInvalidGroups || pSector->ubAdminsInBattle || pSector->ubTroopsInBattle || pSector->ubElitesInBattle || pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle )
00215       {
00216             UINT16 str[ 512 ];
00217             swprintf( str, L"Strategic info warning:  Sector 'in battle' counters are not clear when they should be.  "
00218                                                        L"If you can provide information on how a previous battle was resolved here or nearby patrol "
00219                                                        L"(auto resolve, tactical battle, cheat keys, or retreat),"
00220                                                        L"please forward that info (no data files necessary) as well as the following code (very important):  "
00221                                                        L"G(%02d:%c%d_b%d) A(%02d:%02d) T(%02d:%02d) E(%02d:%02d) C(%02d:%02d)",
00222                                                        ubInvalidGroups, pLocGroup->ubSectorY + 'A' - 1, pLocGroup->ubSectorX, pLocGroup->ubSectorZ,
00223                                                        pSector->ubNumAdmins, pSector->ubAdminsInBattle,
00224                                                        pSector->ubNumTroops, pSector->ubTroopsInBattle,
00225                                                        pSector->ubNumElites, pSector->ubElitesInBattle,
00226                                                        pSector->ubNumCreatures, pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle );
00227             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00228             pSector->ubAdminsInBattle = 0;
00229             pSector->ubTroopsInBattle = 0;
00230             pSector->ubElitesInBattle = 0;
00231             pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle = 0;
00232       }
00233 }
00234 #endif

00236 void InitPreBattleInterface( GROUP *pBattleGroup, BOOLEAN fPersistantPBI )
00237 {
00238   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00239       INT32 i;
00240       UINT8 ubGroupID = 0;
00241       UINT8 ubNumStationaryEnemies = 0;
00242       UINT8 ubNumMobileEnemies = 0;
00243       UINT8 ubNumMercs;
00244       BOOLEAN fUsePluralVersion = FALSE;
00245       INT8  bBestExpLevel = 0;
00246       BOOLEAN fRetreatAnOption = TRUE;
00247       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00248 
00249 
00250       // ARM: Feb01/98 - Cancel out of mapscreen movement plotting if PBI subscreen is coming up
00251       if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
00252       {
00253             AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
00254       }
00255 
00256       if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
00257             return;
00258 
00259       gfPersistantPBI = fPersistantPBI;
00260 
00261       if( gfPersistantPBI )
00262       {
00263             gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = TRUE;
00264             gfBlinkHeader = FALSE;
00265 
00266             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00267                   if( pBattleGroup )
00268                   {
00269                         ValidateAndCorrectInBattleCounters( pBattleGroup );
00270                   }
00271             #endif
00272 
00273             //    InitializeTacticalStatusAtBattleStart();
00274             // CJC, Oct 5 98: this is all we should need from InitializeTacticalStatusAtBattleStart()
00275             if( gubEnemyEncounterCode != BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE && gubEnemyEncounterCode != ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE )
00276             {
00277                   if ( CheckFact( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_FOUGHT, 0 ) == FALSE )
00278                   {
00279                         SetFactTrue( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_BEING_FOUGHT );
00280                   }
00281             }
00282 
00283             //If we are currently in the AI Viewer development utility, then remove it first.  It automatically
00284             //returns to the mapscreen upon removal, which is where we want to go.
00285             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00286                   if( guiCurrentScreen == AIVIEWER_SCREEN )
00287                   {
00288                         gfExitViewer = TRUE;
00289                         gpBattleGroup = pBattleGroup;
00290                         gfEnteringMapScreen = TRUE;
00291                         gfEnteringMapScreenToEnterPreBattleInterface = TRUE;
00292                         gfUsePersistantPBI = TRUE;
00293                         return;
00294                   }
00295             #endif
00296 
00297             // ATE: Added check for fPersistantPBI = TRUE if pBattleGroup == NULL
00298             // Searched code and saw that this condition only happens for creatures
00299                   // fixing a bug
00300             //if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN && pBattleGroup )
00301             if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN && ( pBattleGroup || fPersistantPBI ) )
00302             {
00303                   gpBattleGroup = pBattleGroup;
00304                   gfEnteringMapScreen = TRUE;
00305                   gfEnteringMapScreenToEnterPreBattleInterface = TRUE;
00306                   gfUsePersistantPBI = TRUE;
00307                   return;
00308             }
00309             
00310             if( gfTacticalTraversal && (pBattleGroup == gpTacticalTraversalGroup || gbWorldSectorZ > 0) ) 
00311             {
00312                   return;
00313             }
00314 
00315             // reset the help text for mouse regions
00316             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gCharInfoHandRegion, L"" );
00317             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gMapStatusBarsRegion, L"" );
00318 
00319             gfDisplayPotentialRetreatPaths = FALSE;
00320 
00321             gpBattleGroup = pBattleGroup;
00322             
00323             //calc sector values
00324             if( gpBattleGroup )
00325             {
00326                   gubPBSectorX = gpBattleGroup->ubSectorX;
00327                   gubPBSectorY = gpBattleGroup->ubSectorY;
00328                   gubPBSectorZ = gpBattleGroup->ubSectorZ;
00329 
00330                   // get number of enemies thought to be here
00331                   SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY ) ].bLastKnownEnemies = NumEnemiesInSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY );
00332                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00333             }
00334             else
00335             {
00336                   gubPBSectorX = (UINT8)SECTORX( gubSectorIDOfCreatureAttack );
00337                   gubPBSectorY = (UINT8)SECTORY( gubSectorIDOfCreatureAttack );
00338                   gubPBSectorZ = 0;
00339             }
00340       }
00341       else
00342       { //calculate the non-persistant situation
00343             gfBlinkHeader = TRUE;
00344 
00345             if( HostileCiviliansPresent() )
00346             { //There are hostile civilians, so no autoresolve allowed.
00347                   gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode = HOSTILE_CIVILIANS_CODE;
00348             }
00349             else if( HostileBloodcatsPresent() )
00350             { //There are bloodcats in the sector, so no autoresolve allowed
00351                   gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode = HOSTILE_BLOODCATS_CODE;
00352             }
00353             else if( gbWorldSectorZ )
00354             { //We are underground, so no autoresolve allowed
00355                   pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY ) ];
00356                   if( pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle )
00357                   { 
00358                         gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode = FIGHTING_CREATURES_CODE;
00359                   }
00360                   else if( pSector->ubAdminsInBattle || pSector->ubTroopsInBattle || pSector->ubElitesInBattle )
00361                   {
00362                         gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode = ENTERING_ENEMY_SECTOR_CODE;
00363                   }
00364             }
00365             else if( gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENTERING_ENEMY_SECTOR_CODE ||
00366                                      gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENEMY_ENCOUNTER_CODE || 
00367                                      gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE || 
00368                                      gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENEMY_INVASION_CODE ||
00369                                      gubEnemyEncounterCode == BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE ||
00370                                      gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE ||
00371                                      gubEnemyEncounterCode == CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE )
00372             { //use same code
00373                   gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode = gubEnemyEncounterCode;
00374             }
00375             else 
00376             {
00377                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00378                         DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( L"Can't determine valid reason for battle indicator.  Please try to provide information as to when and why this indicator first appeared and send whatever files that may help.", MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00379                   #endif
00380                   gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = FALSE;
00381                   return;
00382             }
00383       }
00384 
00385       fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00386       ChangeSelectedMapSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY, gubPBSectorZ );
00387       RenderMapScreenInterfaceBottom();
00388 
00389       //If we are currently in tactical, then set the flag to automatically bring up the mapscreen.
00390       if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00391       {
00392             gfEnteringMapScreen = TRUE;
00393       }
00394 
00395       if( !fShowTeamFlag )
00396       {
00397             ToggleShowTeamsMode();
00398       }
00399 
00400       //Define the blanket region to cover all of the other regions used underneath the panel.
00401       MSYS_DefineRegion( &PBInterfaceBlanket, 0, 0, 261, 359, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 5, 0, 0, 0 );
00402 
00403       //Create the panel
00404       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00405       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_PREBATTLEPANEL );
00406       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &uiInterfaceImages ) )
00407             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load interface\\PreBattlePanel.sti" );
00408 
00409       //Create the 3 buttons
00410       iPBButtonImage[0] = LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\PreBattleButton.sti", -1, 0, -1, 1, -1 );
00411       if( iPBButtonImage[ 0 ] == -1 )
00412             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load interface\\PreBattleButton.sti" );
00413       iPBButtonImage[1] = UseLoadedButtonImage( iPBButtonImage[ 0 ], -1, 0, -1, 1, -1 );
00414       iPBButtonImage[2] = UseLoadedButtonImage( iPBButtonImage[ 0 ], -1, 0, -1, 1, -1 );
00415       iPBButton[0] = QuickCreateButton( iPBButtonImage[0], 27, 54, BUTTON_NO_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 2, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, AutoResolveBattleCallback );
00416       iPBButton[1] = QuickCreateButton( iPBButtonImage[1], 98, 54, BUTTON_NO_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 2, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, GoToSectorCallback );
00417       iPBButton[2] = QuickCreateButton( iPBButtonImage[2], 169, 54, BUTTON_NO_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 2, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, RetreatMercsCallback );
00418 
00419       SpecifyGeneralButtonTextAttributes( iPBButton[0], gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_AUTORESOLVE_BTN ], BLOCKFONT, FONT_BEIGE, 141 );
00420       SpecifyGeneralButtonTextAttributes( iPBButton[1], gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_GOTOSECTOR_BTN ], BLOCKFONT, FONT_BEIGE, 141 );
00421       SpecifyGeneralButtonTextAttributes( iPBButton[2], gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_RETREATMERCS_BTN ], BLOCKFONT, FONT_BEIGE, 141 );
00422       SpecifyButtonHilitedTextColors( iPBButton[0], FONT_WHITE, FONT_NEARBLACK );
00423       SpecifyButtonHilitedTextColors( iPBButton[1], FONT_WHITE, FONT_NEARBLACK );
00424       SpecifyButtonHilitedTextColors( iPBButton[2], FONT_WHITE, FONT_NEARBLACK );
00425       SpecifyButtonTextOffsets( iPBButton[0], 8, 7, TRUE );
00426       SpecifyButtonTextOffsets( iPBButton[1], 8, 7, TRUE );
00427       SpecifyButtonTextOffsets( iPBButton[2], 8, 7, TRUE );
00428       SpecifyButtonTextWrappedWidth( iPBButton[0], 51 );
00429       SpecifyButtonTextWrappedWidth( iPBButton[1], 51 );
00430       SpecifyButtonTextWrappedWidth( iPBButton[2], 51 );
00431       SpecifyButtonTextJustification( iPBButton[0], BUTTON_TEXT_CENTER );
00432       SpecifyButtonTextJustification( iPBButton[1], BUTTON_TEXT_CENTER );
00433       SpecifyButtonTextJustification( iPBButton[2], BUTTON_TEXT_CENTER );
00434       AllowDisabledButtonFastHelp( iPBButton[0], TRUE );
00435       AllowDisabledButtonFastHelp( iPBButton[1], TRUE );
00436       AllowDisabledButtonFastHelp( iPBButton[2], TRUE );
00437 
00438       gusRetreatButtonLeft          = ButtonList[ iPBButton[2] ]->Area.RegionTopLeftX;
00439       gusRetreatButtonTop                 = ButtonList[ iPBButton[2] ]->Area.RegionTopLeftY;
00440       gusRetreatButtonRight         = ButtonList[ iPBButton[2] ]->Area.RegionBottomRightX;
00441       gusRetreatButtonBottom  = ButtonList[ iPBButton[2] ]->Area.RegionBottomRightY;
00442 
00443       SetButtonCursor(iPBButtonImage[ 0 ], MSYS_NO_CURSOR );
00444       SetButtonCursor(iPBButtonImage[ 1 ], MSYS_NO_CURSOR );
00445       SetButtonCursor(iPBButtonImage[ 2 ], MSYS_NO_CURSOR );
00446 
00447       HideButton( iPBButton[0] );
00448       HideButton( iPBButton[1] );
00449       HideButton( iPBButton[2] );
00450       gfPBButtonsHidden = TRUE;
00451 
00452       // ARM: this must now be set before any calls utilizing the GetCurrentBattleSectorXYZ() function
00453       gfPreBattleInterfaceActive = TRUE;
00454 
00455 
00456       CheckForRobotAndIfItsControlled();
00457 
00458       // wake everyone up
00459       WakeUpAllMercsInSectorUnderAttack( );
00460 
00461       //Count the number of players involved or not involved in this battle
00462       guiNumUninvolved = 0;
00463       guiNumInvolved = 0;
00464       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
00465       {
00466             if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife && !(MercPtrs[ i ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) )
00467             {
00468                   if ( PlayerMercInvolvedInThisCombat( MercPtrs[ i ] ) )
00469                   {
00470                         // involved
00471                         if( !ubGroupID )
00472                         { //Record the first groupID.  If there are more than one group in this battle, we
00473                               //can detect it by comparing the first value with future values.  If we do, then
00474                               //we set a flag which determines whether to use the singular help text or plural version
00475                               //for the retreat button.
00476                               ubGroupID = MercPtrs[ i ]->ubGroupID;
00477                               if( !gpBattleGroup )
00478                                     gpBattleGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
00479                               if( bBestExpLevel > MercPtrs[ i ]->bExpLevel )
00480                                     bBestExpLevel = MercPtrs[ i ]->bExpLevel;
00481                               if( MercPtrs[ i ]->ubPrevSectorID == 255 )
00482                               { //Not able to retreat (calculate it for group)
00483                                     GROUP *pTempGroup;
00484                                     pTempGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
00485                                     Assert( pTempGroup );
00486                                     CalculateGroupRetreatSector( pTempGroup );
00487                               }
00488                         }
00489                         else if( ubGroupID != MercPtrs[ i ]->ubGroupID )
00490                         {
00491                               fUsePluralVersion = TRUE;
00492                         }
00493                         guiNumInvolved ++;
00494                   }
00495                   else
00496                         guiNumUninvolved++;
00497             }
00498       }
00499 
00500       ubNumStationaryEnemies = NumStationaryEnemiesInSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY );
00501       ubNumMobileEnemies = NumMobileEnemiesInSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY );
00502       ubNumMercs = PlayerMercsInSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY, gubPBSectorZ );
00503 
00504       if( gfPersistantPBI )
00505       {
00506             if( !pBattleGroup )
00507             { //creature's attacking!
00508                   gubEnemyEncounterCode = CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE;
00509             }
00510             else if( gpBattleGroup->fPlayer )
00511             {
00512                   if( gubEnemyEncounterCode != BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE && gubEnemyEncounterCode != ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE )
00513                   {
00514                         if( ubNumStationaryEnemies )
00515                         {
00516                               gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENTERING_ENEMY_SECTOR_CODE;
00517                         }
00518                         else
00519                         {
00520                               gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENEMY_ENCOUNTER_CODE;
00521 
00522                               //Don't consider ambushes until the player has reached 25% (normal) progress
00523                               if( gfHighPotentialForAmbush )
00524                               {
00525                                     if( Chance( 90 ) )
00526                                     {
00527                                           gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE;
00528                                     }
00529                               }
00530                               else if( gfAutoAmbush && ubNumMobileEnemies > ubNumMercs )
00531                               {
00532                                     gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE;
00533                               }
00534                               // Madd
00535                               else if( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel == DIF_LEVEL_INSANE && 
00536                                                        CurrentPlayerProgressPercentage() >= 25 )
00537                               { //if the enemy outnumbers the players, then there is a chance of the enemies ambushing the group
00538                                     if( ubNumMobileEnemies > ubNumMercs )
00539                                     {
00540                                           INT32 iChance;
00541                                           pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY ) ];
00542                                           iChance = (UINT8)( (CurrentPlayerProgressPercentage() - bBestExpLevel*2 ) );
00543                                           if( pSector->uiFlags & SF_ENEMY_AMBUSH_LOCATION )
00544                                           {
00545                                                 iChance += 20;
00546                                           }
00547                                           if( gfCantRetreatInPBI )
00548                                           {
00549                                                 iChance += 20;
00550                                           }
00551                                           if( (INT32)PreRandom( 100 ) < iChance )
00552                                           {
00553                                                 gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE;
00554                                           }
00555                                     }
00556                               }
00557                               else if( WhatPlayerKnowsAboutEnemiesInSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY ) == KNOWS_NOTHING && 
00558                                                        CurrentPlayerProgressPercentage() >= 30 - gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel * 5 )
00559                               { //if the enemy outnumbers the players, then there is a small chance of the enemies ambushing the group
00560                                     if( ubNumMobileEnemies > ubNumMercs )
00561                                     {
00562                                           INT32 iChance;
00563                                           pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY ) ];
00564                                           if( !(pSector->uiFlags & SF_ALREADY_VISITED) )
00565                                           {
00566                                                 iChance = (UINT8)( 4 - bBestExpLevel + 2 * gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel + CurrentPlayerProgressPercentage() / 10 );
00567                                                 if( pSector->uiFlags & SF_ENEMY_AMBUSH_LOCATION )
00568                                                 {
00569                                                       iChance += 20;
00570                                                 }
00571                                                 if( gfCantRetreatInPBI )
00572                                                 {
00573                                                       iChance += 20;
00574                                                 }
00575                                                 if( (INT32)PreRandom( 100 ) < iChance )
00576                                                 {
00577                                                       gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE;
00578                                                 }
00579                                           }
00580                                     }
00581                               }
00582                         }
00583                   }
00584             }
00585             else
00586             { //Are enemies invading a town, or just encountered the player.
00587                   if( GetTownIdForSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY ) )
00588                   {
00589                         gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENEMY_INVASION_CODE;
00590                   }
00591                   else
00592                   {
00593                         switch( SECTOR( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY ) )
00594                         {
00595                               case SEC_D2:
00596                               case SEC_D15:
00597                               case SEC_G8:
00598                                     //SAM sites not in towns will also be considered to be important
00599                                     gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENEMY_INVASION_CODE;
00600                                     break;
00601                               default:
00602                                     gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENEMY_ENCOUNTER_CODE;
00603                                     break;
00604                         }
00605                   }     
00606             }
00607       }
00608 
00609       gfHighPotentialForAmbush = FALSE;
00610 
00611       if( gfAutomaticallyStartAutoResolve )
00612       {
00613             DisableButton( iPBButton[1] );
00614             DisableButton( iPBButton[2] );
00615       }
00616 
00617       gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
00618       giHilitedInvolved = giHilitedUninvolved = -1;
00619       MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( CURSOR_NORMAL );
00620       StopTimeCompression();
00621 
00622       // hide all visible boxes
00623       HideAllBoxes( );
00624       fShowAssignmentMenu = FALSE;
00625       fShowContractMenu = FALSE;
00626       DisableTeamInfoPanels();
00627       if( ButtonList[ giMapContractButton ] )
00628       {
00629             HideButton( giMapContractButton );
00630       }
00631       if( ButtonList[ giCharInfoButton[ 0 ] ] )
00632       {
00633             HideButton( giCharInfoButton[ 0 ] );
00634       }
00635       if( ButtonList[ giCharInfoButton[ 1 ] ] )
00636       {
00637             HideButton( giCharInfoButton[ 1 ] );
00638       }
00639       HideButton( giMapContractButton );
00640 
00641       if( gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENEMY_ENCOUNTER_CODE )
00642       { //we know how many enemies are here, so until we leave the sector, we will continue to display the value.
00643             //the flag will get cleared when time advances after the fEnemyInSector flag is clear.
00644             pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY ) ];
00645 
00646             // ALWAYS use these 2 statements together, without setting the boolean, the flag will never be cleaned up!
00647             pSector->uiFlags |= SF_PLAYER_KNOWS_ENEMIES_ARE_HERE;
00648             gfResetAllPlayerKnowsEnemiesFlags = TRUE;
00649       }
00650 
00651       //Set up fast help for buttons depending on the state of the button, and disable buttons
00652       //when necessary.
00653       if( gfPersistantPBI )
00654       {
00655             if( gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENTERING_ENEMY_SECTOR_CODE || 
00656                         gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE )
00657             { //Don't allow autoresolve for player initiated invasion battle types
00658                   DisableButton( iPBButton[ 0 ] );
00659                   SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 0 ], gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_DISABLED_AUTORESOLVE_FASTHELP ] );
00660             }
00661             else if( gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE || 
00662                                      gubEnemyEncounterCode == BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE )
00663             { //Don't allow autoresolve for ambushes
00664                   DisableButton( iPBButton[ 0 ] );
00665                   SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 0 ], gzNonPersistantPBIText[ 3 ] );
00666             }
00667             else
00668             {
00669                   SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 0 ], gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_AUTORESOLVE_FASTHELP ] );
00670             }
00671             SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 1 ], gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_GOTOSECTOR_FASTHELP ] );
00672             if( gfAutomaticallyStartAutoResolve )
00673             {
00674                   DisableButton( iPBButton[ 1 ] );
00675             }
00676             if( gfCantRetreatInPBI )
00677             {
00678                   gfCantRetreatInPBI = FALSE;
00679                   fRetreatAnOption = FALSE;
00680             }
00681             if( gfAutomaticallyStartAutoResolve || !fRetreatAnOption || 
00682                         gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE || 
00683                         gubEnemyEncounterCode == BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE || 
00684                         gubEnemyEncounterCode == CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE )
00685             {
00686                   DisableButton( iPBButton[ 2 ] );
00687                   SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 2 ], gzNonPersistantPBIText[ 9 ] );
00688             }
00689             else
00690             {
00691                   if( !fUsePluralVersion )
00692                   {
00693                         SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 2 ], gpStrategicString[ STR_BP_RETREATSINGLE_FASTHELP ] );
00694                   }
00695                   else
00696                   {
00697                         SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 2 ], gpStrategicString[ STR_BP_RETREATPLURAL_FASTHELP ] );
00698                   }
00699             }
00700       }
00701       else
00702       { //use the explicit encounter code to determine what get's disable and the associated help text that is used.
00703             
00704             //First of all, the retreat button is always disabled seeing a battle is in progress.
00705             DisableButton( iPBButton[ 2 ] );
00706             SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 2 ], gzNonPersistantPBIText[ 0 ] );
00707             SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 1 ], gzNonPersistantPBIText[ 1 ] );
00708             switch( gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode )
00709             {
00710                   case CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE:
00711                   case ENEMY_ENCOUNTER_CODE:
00712                   case ENEMY_INVASION_CODE:
00713                         SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 0 ], gzNonPersistantPBIText[ 2 ] );
00714                         break;
00715                   case ENTERING_ENEMY_SECTOR_CODE:
00716                         DisableButton( iPBButton[ 0 ] );
00717                         SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 0 ], gzNonPersistantPBIText[ 3 ] );
00718                         break;
00719                   case ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE:
00720                         DisableButton( iPBButton[ 0 ] );
00721                         SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 0 ], gzNonPersistantPBIText[ 4 ] );
00722                         break;
00723                   case FIGHTING_CREATURES_CODE:
00724                         DisableButton( iPBButton[ 0 ] );
00725                         SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 0 ], gzNonPersistantPBIText[ 5 ] );
00726                         break;
00727                   case HOSTILE_CIVILIANS_CODE:
00728                         DisableButton( iPBButton[ 0 ] );
00729                         SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 0 ], gzNonPersistantPBIText[ 6 ] );
00730                         break;
00731                   case HOSTILE_BLOODCATS_CODE:
00732                   case BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE:
00733                   case ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE:
00734                         DisableButton( iPBButton[ 0 ] );
00735                         SetButtonFastHelpText( iPBButton[ 0 ], gzNonPersistantPBIText[ 7 ] );
00736                         break;
00737             }
00738       }
00739 
00740       //Disable the options button when the auto resolve  screen comes up
00741       EnableDisAbleMapScreenOptionsButton( FALSE );
00742 
00743       SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_ENEMYPRESENT );
00744 
00745       DoTransitionFromMapscreenToPreBattleInterface();
00746 }
00747 
00748 void DoTransitionFromMapscreenToPreBattleInterface()
00749 {
00750       SGPRect DstRect, PBIRect;
00751       UINT32 uiStartTime, uiCurrTime;
00752       INT32 iPercentage, iFactor;
00753       UINT32 uiTimeRange;
00754       INT16 sStartLeft, sEndLeft, sStartTop, sEndTop;
00755       INT32 iLeft, iTop, iWidth, iHeight;
00756       BOOLEAN fEnterAutoResolveMode = FALSE;
00757 
00758       if( !gfExtraBuffer )
00759             return;
00760 
00761       PauseTime( FALSE );
00762 
00763       PBIRect.iLeft = 0;
00764       PBIRect.iTop = 0;
00765       PBIRect.iRight = 261;
00766       PBIRect.iBottom = 359;
00767       iWidth = 261;
00768       iHeight = 359;
00769       
00770       uiTimeRange = 1000;
00771       iPercentage = 0;
00772       uiStartTime = GetJA2Clock();
00773 
00774       GetScreenXYFromMapXY( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY, &sStartLeft, &sStartTop );
00775       sStartLeft += MAP_GRID_X / 2;
00776       sStartTop += MAP_GRID_Y / 2;
00777       sEndLeft = 131;
00778       sEndTop = 180;
00779 
00780       //save the mapscreen buffer
00781       BlitBufferToBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, guiEXTRABUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00782 
00783       if( gfEnterAutoResolveMode )
00784       { //If we are intending on immediately entering autoresolve, change the global flag so that it will actually 
00785             //render the interface once.  If gfEnterAutoResolveMode is clear, then RenderPreBattleInterface() won't do 
00786             //anything.
00787             fEnterAutoResolveMode = TRUE;
00788             gfEnterAutoResolveMode = FALSE;
00789       }
00790       //render the prebattle interface
00791       RenderPreBattleInterface();
00792 
00793       gfIgnoreAllInput = TRUE;
00794 
00795       if( fEnterAutoResolveMode )
00796       { //Change it back
00797             gfEnterAutoResolveMode = TRUE;
00798       }
00799 
00800       BlitBufferToBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, 27, 54, 209, 32 );
00801       RenderButtons();
00802       BlitBufferToBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 27, 54, 209, 32 );
00803       gfRenderPBInterface = TRUE;
00804 
00805       //hide the prebattle interface
00806       BlitBufferToBuffer( guiEXTRABUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, 261, 359 );
00807       PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "SOUNDS\\Laptop power up (8-11).wav", RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
00808       InvalidateScreen();
00809       RefreshScreen( NULL );
00810 
00811       while( iPercentage < 100  )
00812       {
00813             uiCurrTime = GetJA2Clock();
00814             iPercentage = (uiCurrTime-uiStartTime) * 100 / uiTimeRange;
00815             iPercentage = min( iPercentage, 100 );
00816 
00817             //Factor the percentage so that it is modified by a gravity falling acceleration effect.
00818             iFactor = (iPercentage - 50) * 2;
00819             if( iPercentage < 50 )
00820                   iPercentage = (UINT32)(iPercentage + iPercentage * iFactor * 0.01 + 0.5);
00821             else
00822                   iPercentage = (UINT32)(iPercentage + (100-iPercentage) * iFactor * 0.01 + 0.05);
00823 
00824             //Calculate the center point.
00825             iLeft = sStartLeft - (sStartLeft-sEndLeft+1) * iPercentage / 100;
00826             if( sStartTop > sEndTop )
00827                   iTop = sStartTop - (sStartTop-sEndTop+1) * iPercentage / 100;
00828             else
00829                   iTop = sStartTop + (sEndTop-sStartTop+1) * iPercentage / 100;
00830 
00831             DstRect.iLeft = iLeft - iWidth * iPercentage / 200;
00832             DstRect.iRight = DstRect.iLeft + max( iWidth * iPercentage / 100, 1 );
00833             DstRect.iTop = iTop - iHeight * iPercentage / 200;
00834             DstRect.iBottom = DstRect.iTop + max( iHeight * iPercentage / 100, 1 );
00835 
00836             BltStretchVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, 0, &PBIRect, &DstRect );
00837 
00838             InvalidateScreen();
00839             RefreshScreen( NULL );
00840 
00841             //Restore the previous rect.
00842             BlitBufferToBuffer( guiEXTRABUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, (UINT16)DstRect.iLeft, (UINT16)DstRect.iTop, 
00843                   (UINT16)(DstRect.iRight-DstRect.iLeft+1), (UINT16)(DstRect.iBottom-DstRect.iTop+1) );
00844       }
00845       BlitBufferToBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00846 }
00847 
00848 void KillPreBattleInterface()
00849 {
00850       if( !gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
00851             return;
00852 
00853       fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle = FALSE;
00854       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &PBInterfaceBlanket );
00855 
00856       //The panel
00857       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiInterfaceImages );
00858 
00859       //The 3 buttons
00860       RemoveButton( iPBButton[0] );
00861       RemoveButton( iPBButton[1] );
00862       RemoveButton( iPBButton[2] );
00863       UnloadButtonImage( iPBButtonImage[0] );
00864       UnloadButtonImage( iPBButtonImage[1] );
00865       UnloadButtonImage( iPBButtonImage[2] );
00866 
00867       /*
00868       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &InvolvedRegion );
00869       if( guiNumUninvolved )
00870             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &UninvolvedRegion );
00871       */
00872 
00873       gfPreBattleInterfaceActive = FALSE;
00874 
00875       //UpdateCharRegionHelpText( );
00876 
00877       // re draw affected regions
00878       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00879       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00880       fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00881       fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
00882       gfDisplayPotentialRetreatPaths = FALSE;
00883 
00884       //Enable the options button when the auto resolve  screen comes up
00885       EnableDisAbleMapScreenOptionsButton( TRUE );
00886 
00887       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, 261, 359, 0 );
00888 
00889       EnableTeamInfoPanels();
00890       if( ButtonList[ giMapContractButton ] )
00891       {
00892             ShowButton( giMapContractButton );
00893       }
00894       if( ButtonList[ giCharInfoButton[ 0 ] ] )
00895       {
00896             ShowButton( giCharInfoButton[ 0 ] );
00897       }
00898       if( ButtonList[ giCharInfoButton[ 1 ] ] )
00899       {
00900             ShowButton( giCharInfoButton[ 1 ] );
00901       }
00902 }
00903 
00904 
00905 void RenderPBHeader( INT32 *piX, INT32 *piWidth)
00906 {
00907       UINT16 str[100];
00908       INT32 x, width;
00909       SetFont( FONT10ARIALBOLD );
00910       if( gfBlinkHeader )
00911       {
00912             if( GetJA2Clock() % 1000 < 667 )
00913             {
00914                   SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
00915             }
00916             else
00917             {
00918                   SetFontForeground( FONT_LTRED );
00919             }
00920       }
00921       else
00922       {
00923             SetFontForeground( FONT_BEIGE );
00924       }
00925       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00926       if( !gfPersistantPBI )
00927       {
00928             swprintf( str, gzNonPersistantPBIText[8] );
00929       }
00930       else switch( gubEnemyEncounterCode )
00931       {
00932             case ENEMY_INVASION_CODE:
00933                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_ENEMYINVASION_HEADER ] );
00934                   break;
00935             case ENEMY_ENCOUNTER_CODE:
00936                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_ENEMYENCOUNTER_HEADER ] );
00937                   break;
00938             case ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE:
00939                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_ENEMYAMBUSH_HEADER ] );
00940                   gfBlinkHeader = TRUE;
00941                   break;
00942             case ENTERING_ENEMY_SECTOR_CODE:
00943                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_ENTERINGENEMYSECTOR_HEADER ] );
00944                   break;
00945             case CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE:
00946                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_CREATUREATTACK_HEADER ] );
00947                   gfBlinkHeader = TRUE;
00948                   break;
00949             case BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE:
00950                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_BLOODCATAMBUSH_HEADER ] );
00951                   gfBlinkHeader = TRUE;
00952                   break;
00953             case ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE:
00954                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_ENTERINGBLOODCATLAIR_HEADER ] );
00955                   break;
00956       }
00957       width = StringPixLength( str, FONT10ARIALBOLD );
00958       x = 130 - width / 2;
00959       mprintf( x, 4, str );
00960       InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, 231, 12 );
00961       *piX = x;
00962       *piWidth = width;
00963 }
00964 
00965 void RenderPreBattleInterface()
00966 {
00967       GROUP *pGroup;
00968       HVOBJECT hVObject;
00969       INT32 i, x, y, line, width;
00970       UINT16 str[100];
00971       UINT16 pSectorName[ 128 ];
00972       UINT8 ubHPPercent, ubBPPercent;
00973       BOOLEAN fMouseInRetreatButtonArea;
00974       UINT8 ubJunk;
00975       //PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
00976 
00977       //This code determines if the cursor is inside the rectangle consisting of the 
00978       //retreat button.  If it is inside, then we set up the variables so that the retreat
00979       //arrows get drawn in the mapscreen.
00980       if( ButtonList[ iPBButton[ 2 ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED )
00981       {
00982             if( gusMouseXPos < gusRetreatButtonLeft || gusMouseXPos > gusRetreatButtonRight ||
00983                         gusMouseYPos < gusRetreatButtonTop || gusMouseYPos > gusRetreatButtonBottom )
00984                   fMouseInRetreatButtonArea = FALSE;
00985             else
00986                   fMouseInRetreatButtonArea = TRUE;
00987             if( fMouseInRetreatButtonArea != gfDisplayPotentialRetreatPaths )
00988             {
00989                   gfDisplayPotentialRetreatPaths = fMouseInRetreatButtonArea;
00990                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00991             }
00992       }
00993 
00994       if( gfRenderPBInterface )
00995       {
00996             // set font destinanation buffer to the save buffer
00997             SetFontDestBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER , 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
00998 
00999             if( gfPBButtonsHidden )
01000             {
01001                   ShowButton( iPBButton[0] );
01002                   ShowButton( iPBButton[1] );
01003                   ShowButton( iPBButton[2] );
01004                   gfPBButtonsHidden = FALSE;
01005             }
01006             else
01007             {
01008                   MarkAButtonDirty( iPBButton[ 0 ] );
01009                   MarkAButtonDirty( iPBButton[ 1 ] );
01010                   MarkAButtonDirty( iPBButton[ 2 ] );
01011             }
01012 
01013             gfRenderPBInterface = FALSE;
01014             GetVideoObject( &hVObject, uiInterfaceImages );
01015             //main panel
01016             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hVObject, MAINPANEL, 0, 0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01017             //main title
01018 
01019             RenderPBHeader( &x, &width );
01020             //now draw the title bars up to the text.
01021             for( i = x - 12; i > 20; i -= 10 )
01022             {
01023                   BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hVObject, TITLE_BAR_PIECE, i, 6, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01024             }
01025             for( i = x + width + 2; i < 231; i += 10 )
01026             {
01027                   BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hVObject, TITLE_BAR_PIECE, i, 6, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01028             }
01029 
01030             y = BOTTOM_Y - ACTUAL_HEIGHT - ROW_HEIGHT * max( guiNumUninvolved, 1 );
01031             BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hVObject, UNINVOLVED_HEADER, 8, y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01032 
01033             SetFont( BLOCKFONT );
01034             SetFontForeground( FONT_BEIGE );
01035             swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_LOCATION ] );
01036             width = StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT );
01037             if( width > 64 )
01038             {
01039                   SetFont( BLOCKFONTNARROW );
01040                   width = StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONTNARROW );
01041             }
01042             mprintf( 65 - width , 17, str );
01043 
01044             SetFont( BLOCKFONT );
01045             if( gubEnemyEncounterCode != CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE )
01046             {
01047                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_ENEMIES ] );
01048             }
01049             else if( gubEnemyEncounterCode == BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE || gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE )
01050             {
01051                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_BLOODCATS ] );
01052             }
01053             else
01054             {
01055                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_CREATURES ] );
01056             }
01057             width = StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT );
01058             if( width > 52 )
01059             {
01060                   SetFont( BLOCKFONTNARROW );
01061                   width = StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONTNARROW );
01062             }
01063             mprintf( 54 - width , 38, str );
01064             
01065             SetFont( BLOCKFONT );
01066             swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_MERCS ] );
01067             width = StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT );
01068             if( width > 52 )
01069             {
01070                   SetFont( BLOCKFONTNARROW );
01071                   width = StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONTNARROW );
01072             }
01073             mprintf( 139 - width , 38, str );
01074             
01075             SetFont( BLOCKFONT );
01076             swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_MILITIA ] );
01077             width = StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT );
01078             if( width > 52 )
01079             {
01080                   SetFont( BLOCKFONTNARROW );
01081                   width = StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONTNARROW );
01082             }
01083             mprintf( 224 - width , 38, str );
01084 
01085             //Draw the bottom columns
01086             for( i = 0; i < (INT32)max( guiNumUninvolved, 1 ); i++ )
01087             {
01088                   y = BOTTOM_Y - ROW_HEIGHT * (i+1) + 1;
01089                   BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hVObject, BOTTOM_COLUMN, 161, y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01090             }
01091 
01092             for( i = 0; i < (INT32)(21 - max( guiNumUninvolved, 1 )); i++ )
01093             {
01094                   y = TOP_Y + ROW_HEIGHT * i;
01095                   BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hVObject, TOP_COLUMN, 186, y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01096             }
01097 
01098             //location
01099             SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
01100             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01101             SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
01102 
01103             GetSectorIDString( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY, gubPBSectorZ, pSectorName, TRUE );
01104             mprintf( 70, 17, L"%s %s", gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_SECTOR ], pSectorName );
01105 
01106             //enemy 
01107             SetFont( FONT14ARIAL );
01108             if( gubEnemyEncounterCode == CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE || 
01109                     gubEnemyEncounterCode == BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE ||
01110                         gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE ||
01111                         WhatPlayerKnowsAboutEnemiesInSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY ) != KNOWS_HOW_MANY )
01112             {
01113                   // don't know how many
01114                   swprintf( str, L"?" );
01115                   SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY ) ].bLastKnownEnemies = -2;
01116             }
01117             else
01118             {
01119                   // know exactly how many
01120                   i = NumEnemiesInSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY );
01121                   swprintf( str, L"%d", i );
01122                   SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY ) ].bLastKnownEnemies = (INT8)i;
01123             }
01124             x = 57 + (27 - StringPixLength( str, FONT14ARIAL )) / 2;
01125             y = 36;
01126             mprintf( x, y, str );
01127             //player
01128             swprintf( str, L"%d", guiNumInvolved );
01129             x = 142 + (27 - StringPixLength( str, FONT14ARIAL )) / 2;
01130             mprintf( x, y, str );
01131             //militia
01132             swprintf( str, L"%d", CountAllMilitiaInSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY ) );
01133             x = 227 + (27 - StringPixLength( str, FONT14ARIAL )) / 2;
01134             mprintf( x, y, str );
01135             SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
01136 
01137             SetFont( BLOCKFONT2 );
01138             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01139 
01140             //print out the participants of the battle.
01141             // |  NAME  | ASSIGN |  COND  |   HP   |   BP   |
01142             line = 0;
01143             y = TOP_Y + 1;
01144             for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01145             {
01146                   if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife && !(MercPtrs[ i ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) )
01147                   {
01148                         if ( PlayerMercInvolvedInThisCombat( MercPtrs[ i ] ) )
01149                         { //involved
01150                               if( line == giHilitedInvolved )
01151                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
01152                               else
01153                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01154                               //NAME
01155                               wcscpy( str, MercPtrs[ i ]->name );
01156                               x = 17 + (52-StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT2)) / 2;
01157                               mprintf( x , y, str );
01158                               //ASSIGN
01159                               GetMapscreenMercAssignmentString( MercPtrs[ i ], str );
01160                               x = 72 + (54-StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT2)) / 2;
01161                               mprintf( x, y, str );
01162                               //COND
01163                               GetSoldierConditionInfo( MercPtrs[ i ], str, &ubHPPercent, &ubBPPercent );
01164                               x = 129 + (58-StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT2)) / 2;
01165                               mprintf( x, y, str );
01166                               //HP
01167                               swprintf( str, L"%d%%", ubHPPercent );
01168                               x = 189 + (25-StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT2)) / 2;
01169                               wcscat( str, L"%" );
01170                               mprintf( x, y, str );
01171                               //BP
01172                               swprintf( str, L"%d%%", ubBPPercent );
01173                               x = 217 + (25-StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT2)) / 2;
01174                               wcscat( str, L"%" );
01175                               mprintf( x, y, str );
01176 
01177                               line++;
01178                               y += ROW_HEIGHT;
01179                         }
01180                   }
01181             }
01182 
01183             //print out the uninvolved members of the battle
01184             // |  NAME  | ASSIGN |  LOC   |  DEST  |  DEP   |  
01185             if( !guiNumUninvolved )
01186             {
01187                   SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01188                   wcscpy( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_NONE ] );
01189                   x = 17 + (52-StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT2)) / 2;
01190                   y = BOTTOM_Y - ROW_HEIGHT + 2;
01191                   mprintf( x, y, str );
01192             }
01193             else
01194             {
01195                   pGroup = gpGroupList;
01196                   y = BOTTOM_Y - ROW_HEIGHT * guiNumUninvolved + 2;
01197                   for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01198                   {
01199                         if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife && !(MercPtrs[ i ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) )
01200                         {
01201                               if ( !PlayerMercInvolvedInThisCombat( MercPtrs[ i ] ) )
01202                               {
01203                                     // uninvolved
01204                                     if( line == giHilitedUninvolved )
01205                                           SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
01206                                     else
01207                                           SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01208                                     //NAME
01209                                     wcscpy( str, MercPtrs[ i ]->name );
01210                                     x = 17 + (52-StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT2)) / 2;
01211                                     mprintf( x , y, str );
01212                                     //ASSIGN
01213                                     GetMapscreenMercAssignmentString( MercPtrs[ i ], str );
01214                                     x = 72 + (54-StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT2)) / 2;
01215                                     mprintf( x, y, str );
01216                                     //LOC
01217                                     GetMapscreenMercLocationString( MercPtrs[ i ], str );
01218                                     x = 128 + (33-StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT2)) / 2;
01219                                     mprintf( x, y, str );
01220                                     //DEST
01221                                     GetMapscreenMercDestinationString( MercPtrs[ i ], str );
01222                                     if( wcslen( str ) > 0 )
01223                                     {
01224                                           x = 164 + (41-StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT2)) / 2;
01225                                           mprintf( x, y, str );
01226                                     }
01227                                     //DEP
01228                                     GetMapscreenMercDepartureString( MercPtrs[ i ], str, &ubJunk );
01229                                     x = 208 + (34-StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT2)) / 2;
01230                                     mprintf( x, y, str );
01231                                     line++;
01232                                     y += ROW_HEIGHT;
01233                               }
01234                         }
01235                   }
01236             }
01237 
01238             // mark any and ALL pop up boxes as altered
01239             MarkAllBoxesAsAltered( );
01240             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 0, 0, 261, 359 );
01241 
01242             // restore font destinanation buffer to the frame buffer
01243             SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
01244       }
01245       else if( gfBlinkHeader )
01246       {
01247             RenderPBHeader( &x, &width ); //the text is important enough to blink.
01248       }
01249 
01250   //InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, 261, 359 );
01251       if( gfEnterAutoResolveMode )
01252       {
01253             gfEnterAutoResolveMode = FALSE;
01254             EnterAutoResolveMode( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY );
01255             //return;
01256       }
01257 
01258       gfIgnoreAllInput = FALSE;
01259 
01260 }
01261 
01262 void AutoResolveBattleCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01263 {
01264       if( !gfIgnoreAllInput )
01265       {
01266             if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01267             {
01268                   #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01269                         if( _KeyDown( ALT ) )
01270                   #else
01271                         if( _KeyDown( ALT ) && CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
01272                   #endif
01273                         {
01274                               if( !gfPersistantPBI )
01275                               {
01276                                     return;
01277                               }
01278                               PlayJA2Sample( EXPLOSION_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
01279                               gStrategicStatus.usPlayerKills += NumEnemiesInSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY );
01280                               EliminateAllEnemies( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY );
01281                               SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_VICTORY );
01282                               btn->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01283                               DrawButton( btn->IDNum );
01284                               InvalidateRegion( btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY );
01285                               ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
01286                               EndFrameBufferRender( );
01287                               RefreshScreen( NULL );
01288                               KillPreBattleInterface();
01289                               StopTimeCompression();
01290                               SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_NOTHING );
01291                               return;
01292                         }
01293                   gfEnterAutoResolveMode = TRUE;
01294             }
01295       }
01296 }
01297 
01298 void GoToSectorCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01299 {
01300       if( !gfIgnoreAllInput )
01301       {
01302             if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01303             {
01304                   #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01305                         if( _KeyDown( ALT ) )
01306                   #else
01307                         if( _KeyDown( ALT ) && CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
01308                   #endif
01309                         {
01310                               if( !gfPersistantPBI )
01311                               {
01312                                     return;
01313                               }
01314                               PlayJA2Sample( EXPLOSION_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
01315                               gStrategicStatus.usPlayerKills += NumEnemiesInSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY );
01316                               EliminateAllEnemies( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY );
01317                               SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_VICTORY );
01318                               btn->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01319                               DrawButton( btn->IDNum );
01320                               InvalidateRegion( btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY );
01321                               ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
01322                               EndFrameBufferRender( );
01323                               RefreshScreen( NULL );
01324                               KillPreBattleInterface();
01325                               StopTimeCompression();
01326                               SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_NOTHING );
01327                               return;
01328                         }
01329                   if( gfPersistantPBI && gpBattleGroup && gpBattleGroup->fPlayer && 
01330                               gubEnemyEncounterCode != ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE && 
01331                               gubEnemyEncounterCode != CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE &&
01332                               gubEnemyEncounterCode != BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE )
01333                   {
01334                         gfEnterTacticalPlacementGUI = TRUE;
01335                   }
01336                   btn->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01337                   DrawButton( btn->IDNum );
01338                   InvalidateRegion( btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY );
01339                   ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
01340                   EndFrameBufferRender( );
01341                   RefreshScreen( NULL );
01342                   if( gubPBSectorX == gWorldSectorX && gubPBSectorY == gWorldSectorY && !gbWorldSectorZ )
01343                   {
01344                         gfGotoSectorTransition = TRUE;
01345                   }
01346 
01347                   // first time going to the sector?
01348                   if( gfPersistantPBI )
01349                   {
01350                         // put everyone on duty, and remove mercs from vehicles, too
01351                         PutNonSquadMercsInBattleSectorOnSquads( TRUE );
01352 
01353                         // we nuke the groups existing route & destination in advance
01354                         ClearMovementForAllInvolvedPlayerGroups( );
01355                   }
01356                   else
01357                   { //Clear the battlegroup pointer.
01358                         gpBattleGroup = NULL;
01359                   }
01360 
01361                   // must come AFTER anything that needs gpBattleGroup, as it wipes it out
01362                   SetCurrentWorldSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY, gubPBSectorZ );
01363 
01364                   KillPreBattleInterface();
01365                   SetTacticalInterfaceFlags( 0 );
01366             }
01367       }
01368 }
01369 
01370 void RetreatMercsCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01371 {
01372       if( !gfIgnoreAllInput )
01373       {
01374             if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01375             {
01376                   // get them outta here!
01377                   RetreatAllInvolvedPlayerGroups();
01378 
01379                   // NOTE: this code assumes you can never retreat while underground
01380                   HandleLoyaltyImplicationsOfMercRetreat( RETREAT_PBI, gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY, 0 );
01381                   if( CountAllMilitiaInSector( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY ) )
01382                   { //Mercs retreat, but enemies still need to fight the militia
01383                         gfEnterAutoResolveMode = TRUE;
01384                         return;
01385                   }
01386 
01387                   //Warp time by 5 minutes so that player can't just go back into the sector he left.
01388                   WarpGameTime( 300, WARPTIME_NO_PROCESSING_OF_EVENTS );
01389                   ResetMovementForEnemyGroupsInLocation( gubPBSectorX, gubPBSectorY );
01390 
01391                   btn->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01392                   DrawButton( btn->IDNum );
01393                   InvalidateRegion( btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY );
01394                   ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
01395                   EndFrameBufferRender( );
01396                   RefreshScreen( NULL );
01397                   KillPreBattleInterface();
01398                   StopTimeCompression();
01399                   gpBattleGroup = NULL;
01400                   gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = FALSE;
01401 
01402                   SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_NOTHING );
01403             }
01404       }
01405 }
01406 
01407 enum
01408 {
01409       COND_EXCELLENT,
01410       COND_GOOD,
01411       COND_FAIR,
01412       COND_WOUNDED,
01413       COND_FATIGUED,
01414       COND_BLEEDING,
01415       COND_UNCONCIOUS,
01416       COND_DYING,
01417       COND_DEAD
01418 };
01419 
01420 void GetSoldierConditionInfo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 *szCondition, UINT8 *pubHPPercent, UINT8 *pubBPPercent )
01421 {
01422       Assert( pSoldier );
01423       *pubHPPercent = (UINT8)(pSoldier->bLife * 100 / pSoldier->bLifeMax);
01424       *pubBPPercent = pSoldier->bBreath;
01425       //Go from the worst condition to the best.
01426       if( !pSoldier->bLife )
01427       { //0 life
01428             swprintf( szCondition, pConditionStrings[ COND_DEAD ] );
01429       }
01430       else if( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE && pSoldier->bBleeding )
01431       { //life less than OKLIFE and bleeding
01432             swprintf( szCondition, pConditionStrings[ COND_DYING ] );
01433       }
01434       else if( pSoldier->bBreath < OKBREATH && pSoldier->bCollapsed )
01435       { //breath less than OKBREATH
01436             swprintf( szCondition, pConditionStrings[ COND_UNCONCIOUS ] );
01437       }
01438       else if( pSoldier->bBleeding > MIN_BLEEDING_THRESHOLD)
01439       { //bleeding
01440             swprintf( szCondition, pConditionStrings[ COND_BLEEDING ] );
01441       }
01442       else if( pSoldier->bLife*100 < pSoldier->bLifeMax*50 )
01443       { //less than 50% life
01444             swprintf( szCondition, pConditionStrings[ COND_WOUNDED ] );
01445       }
01446       else if( pSoldier->bBreath < 50 )
01447       { //breath less than half
01448             swprintf( szCondition, pConditionStrings[ COND_FATIGUED ] );
01449       }
01450       else if( pSoldier->bLife*100 < pSoldier->bLifeMax*67 )
01451       { //less than 67% life
01452             swprintf( szCondition, pConditionStrings[ COND_FAIR ] );
01453       }
01454       else if( pSoldier->bLife*100 < pSoldier->bLifeMax*86 )
01455       { //less than 86% life
01456             swprintf( szCondition, pConditionStrings[ COND_GOOD ] );
01457       }
01458       else
01459       { //86%+ life
01460             swprintf( szCondition, pConditionStrings[ COND_EXCELLENT ] );
01461       }
01462 }

01535 SOLDIERTYPE* InvolvedSoldier( INT32 index )
01536 {
01537       GROUP *pGroup;
01538       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer=NULL;
01539       BOOLEAN fFound = FALSE;
01540       if( index < 0 || index > 19 )
01541             return NULL;
01542       pGroup = gpGroupList;
01543       while( pGroup && !fFound )
01544       {
01545             if ( PlayerGroupInvolvedInThisCombat( pGroup ) )
01546             {
01547                   pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
01548                   while( pPlayer )
01549                   {
01550                         index--;
01551                         if( index <= 0 )
01552                         {
01553                               fFound = TRUE;
01554                               break;
01555                         }
01556                         pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
01557                   }
01558             }
01559             pGroup = pGroup->next;
01560       }
01561       if( !fFound )
01562             return NULL;
01563       return pPlayer->pSoldier;
01564 }

01589             }

01592       if( !fFound )
01593             return NULL;

01600 void ActivatePreBattleAutoresolveAction()
01601 {
01602       if( ButtonList[ iPBButton[ 0 ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED )
01603       { //Feign call the autoresolve button using the callback
01604             AutoResolveBattleCallback( ButtonList[ iPBButton[0] ], MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP );
01605       }
01606 }
01607 
01608 void ActivatePreBattleEnterSectorAction()
01609 {
01610       if( ButtonList[ iPBButton[ 1 ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED )
01611       { //Feign call the enter sector button using the callback
01612             GoToSectorCallback( ButtonList[ iPBButton[1] ], MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP );
01613       }
01614 }
01615 
01616 void ActivatePreBattleRetreatAction()
01617 {
01618       if( ButtonList[ iPBButton[ 2 ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED )
01619       { //Feign call the retreat button using the callback
01620             RetreatMercsCallback( ButtonList[ iPBButton[2] ], MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP );
01621       }
01622 }
01623 
01624 void ActivateAutomaticAutoResolveStart()
01625 {
01626       ButtonList[ iPBButton[0] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01627       gfIgnoreAllInput = FALSE;
01628       AutoResolveBattleCallback( ButtonList[ iPBButton[0] ], MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP );
01629 }
01630 
01631 void CalculateNonPersistantPBIInfo()
01632 {
01633       //We need to set up the non-persistant PBI
01634       if( !gfBlitBattleSectorLocator || 
01635                   gubPBSectorX != gWorldSectorX || gubPBSectorY != gWorldSectorY || gubPBSectorZ != gbWorldSectorZ )
01636       { //Either the locator isn't on or the locator info is in a different sector
01637       
01638             //Calculated the encounter type 
01639             gubEnemyEncounterCode = NO_ENCOUNTER_CODE;
01640             gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode = NO_ENCOUNTER_CODE;
01641             if( HostileCiviliansPresent() )
01642             { //There are hostile civilians, so no autoresolve allowed.
01643                   gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode = HOSTILE_CIVILIANS_CODE;
01644             }
01645             else if( HostileBloodcatsPresent() )
01646             { //There are bloodcats in the sector, so no autoresolve allowed
01647                   gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode = HOSTILE_BLOODCATS_CODE;
01648             }
01649             else if( gbWorldSectorZ )
01650             {
01651                   UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pSector = FindUnderGroundSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
01652                   Assert( pSector );
01653                   if( pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle )
01654                   { 
01655                         gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode = FIGHTING_CREATURES_CODE;
01656                   }
01657                   else if( pSector->ubAdminsInBattle || pSector->ubTroopsInBattle || pSector->ubElitesInBattle )
01658                   {
01659                         gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode = ENTERING_ENEMY_SECTOR_CODE;
01660                         gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENTERING_ENEMY_SECTOR_CODE;
01661                   }
01662             }
01663             else
01664             {
01665                   SECTORINFO *pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ];
01666                   Assert( pSector );
01667                   if( pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle )
01668                   { 
01669                         gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode = FIGHTING_CREATURES_CODE;
01670                   }
01671                   else if( pSector->ubAdminsInBattle || pSector->ubTroopsInBattle || pSector->ubElitesInBattle )
01672                   {
01673                         gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode = ENTERING_ENEMY_SECTOR_CODE;
01674                         gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENTERING_ENEMY_SECTOR_CODE;
01675                   }
01676             }
01677             if( gubExplicitEnemyEncounterCode != NO_ENCOUNTER_CODE )
01678             {     //Set up the location as well as turning on the blit flag.
01679                   gubPBSectorX = (UINT8)gWorldSectorX;
01680                   gubPBSectorY = (UINT8)gWorldSectorY;
01681                   gubPBSectorZ = (UINT8)gbWorldSectorZ;
01682                   gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = TRUE;
01683             }
01684       }
01685 }
01686 
01687 void ClearNonPersistantPBIInfo()
01688 {
01689       gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = FALSE;
01690 }
