01692 
01693 
01694 void PutNonSquadMercsInBattleSectorOnSquads( BOOLEAN fExitVehicles )
01695 {
01696       GROUP *pGroup, *pNextGroup;
01697 
01698       // IMPORTANT: Have to do this by group, so everyone inside vehicles gets assigned to the same squad.  Needed for
01699       // the tactical placement interface to work in case of simultaneous multi-vehicle arrivals!
01700 
01701       pGroup = gpGroupList;
01702       while( pGroup )
01703       {
01704             // store ptr to next group in list, temporary groups will get deallocated as soon as the merc in it is put on a squad!
01705             pNextGroup = pGroup->next;
01706 
01707             if ( PlayerGroupInvolvedInThisCombat( pGroup ) )
01708             {
01709                   // the helicopter group CAN be involved, if it's on the ground, in which case everybody must get out of it
01710                   if ( IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( pGroup ) )
01711                   {
01712                         // only happens if chopper is on the ground...
01713                         Assert( !fHelicopterIsAirBorne );
01714 
01715                         // put anyone in it into movement group
01716                         MoveAllInHelicopterToFootMovementGroup( );
01717                   }
01718                   else
01719                   {
01720                         PutNonSquadMercsInPlayerGroupOnSquads( pGroup, fExitVehicles );
01721                   }
01722             }
01723 
01724             pGroup = pNextGroup;
01725       }
01726 }
01727 
01728 
01729 void PutNonSquadMercsInPlayerGroupOnSquads( GROUP *pGroup, BOOLEAN fExitVehicles )
01730 {
01731       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer, *pNextPlayer;
01732       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01733       INT8 bUniqueVehicleSquad = -1;
01734       BOOLEAN fSuccess;
01735 
01736 
01737       if ( pGroup->fVehicle )
01738       {
01739             // put these guys on their own squad (we need to return their group ID, and can only return one, so they need a unique one
01740             bUniqueVehicleSquad = GetFirstEmptySquad();
01741             if ( bUniqueVehicleSquad == -1 )
01742             {
01743                   return;
01744             }
01745       }
01746 
01747 
01748       pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
01749 
01750       while( pPlayer )
01751       {
01752             pSoldier = pPlayer->pSoldier;
01753             Assert( pSoldier );
01754 
01755             // store ptr to next soldier in group, once removed from group, his info will get memfree'd!
01756             pNextPlayer = pPlayer->next;
01757 
01758             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
01759             {
01760                   // if involved, but off-duty (includes mercs inside vehicles!)
01761                   if ( PlayerMercInvolvedInThisCombat( pSoldier ) && ( pSoldier->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY ) )
01762                   {
01763                         // if in a vehicle, pull him out
01764                         if( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE )
01765                         {
01766                               if ( fExitVehicles )
01767                               {
01768                                     TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
01769 
01770                                     // put them on the unique squad assigned to people leaving this vehicle.  Can't add them to existing squads,
01771                                     // because if this is a simultaneous group attack, the mercs could be coming from different sides, and the
01772                                     // placement screen can't handle mercs on the same squad arriving from difference edges!
01773                                     fSuccess = AddCharacterToSquad( pSoldier, bUniqueVehicleSquad );
01774                               }
01775                         }
01776                         else
01777                         {
01778                               // add him to ANY on duty foot squad
01779                               fSuccess = AddCharacterToAnySquad( pSoldier );
01780                         }
01781 
01782                         // it better work...
01783                         Assert( fSuccess );
01784 
01785                         // clear any desired squad assignments
01786                         pSoldier -> ubNumTraversalsAllowedToMerge = 0;
01787                         pSoldier -> ubDesiredSquadAssignment = NO_ASSIGNMENT;
01788 
01789                         // stand him up
01790                         MakeSoldiersTacticalAnimationReflectAssignment( pSoldier );
01791                   }
01792             }
01793 
01794             pPlayer = pNextPlayer;
01795       }
01796 }
01797 
01798 
01799 void WakeUpAllMercsInSectorUnderAttack( void )
01800 {
01801       INT32 iCounter = 0, iNumberOfMercsOnTeam = 0;
01802       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
01803 
01804 
01805       // get number of possible grunts on team
01806       iNumberOfMercsOnTeam = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID;
01807 
01808       // any mercs not on duty should be added to the first avail squad
01809       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberOfMercsOnTeam; iCounter++ )
01810       {
01811             pSoldier = &( Menptr[ iCounter ] );
01812 
01813             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
01814             {
01815                   // if involved, but asleep
01816                   if ( PlayerMercInvolvedInThisCombat( pSoldier ) && ( pSoldier->fMercAsleep == TRUE ) )
01817                   {
01818                         // FORCE him wake him up
01819                         SetMercAwake( pSoldier, FALSE, TRUE );
01820                   }
01821             }
01822       }
01823 }
01824 
01825 
01826 // we are entering the sector, clear out all mvt orders for grunts
01827 void ClearMovementForAllInvolvedPlayerGroups( void )
01828 {
01829       GROUP *pGroup;
01830 
01831       pGroup = gpGroupList;
01832       while( pGroup )
01833       {
01834             if ( PlayerGroupInvolvedInThisCombat( pGroup ) )
01835             {
01836                   // clear their strategic movement (mercpaths and waypoints)
01837                   ClearMercPathsAndWaypointsForAllInGroup( pGroup );
01838             }
01839             pGroup = pGroup->next;
01840       }
01841 }
01842 
01843 void RetreatAllInvolvedPlayerGroups( void )
01844 {
01845       GROUP *pGroup;
01846 
01847 
01848       // make sure guys stop their off duty assignments, like militia training!
01849       // but don't exit vehicles - drive off in them!
01850       PutNonSquadMercsInBattleSectorOnSquads( FALSE );
01851 
01852       pGroup = gpGroupList;
01853       while( pGroup )
01854       {
01855             if ( PlayerGroupInvolvedInThisCombat( pGroup ) )
01856             {
01857                   // don't retreat empty vehicle groups!
01858                   if( !pGroup->fVehicle || ( pGroup->fVehicle && DoesVehicleGroupHaveAnyPassengers( pGroup ) ) )
01859                   {
01860                         ClearMercPathsAndWaypointsForAllInGroup( pGroup );
01861                         RetreatGroupToPreviousSector( pGroup );
01862                   }
01863             }
01864             pGroup = pGroup->next;
01865       }
01866 }
01867 
01868 
01869 BOOLEAN PlayerMercInvolvedInThisCombat( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01870 {
01871       Assert( pSoldier );
01872       Assert( pSoldier->bActive );
01873 
01874       if( !pSoldier->fBetweenSectors && 
01875                   pSoldier->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT &&
01876                   pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW &&
01877                   pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_DEAD &&
01878                   !(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) &&
01879                   // Robot is involved if it has a valid controller with it, uninvolved otherwise
01880                   ( !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) || ( pSoldier->ubRobotRemoteHolderID != NOBODY ) ) &&
01881                   !SoldierAboardAirborneHeli( pSoldier ) )
01882       {
01883             if ( CurrentBattleSectorIs( pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ ) )
01884             {
01885                   // involved
01886                   return( TRUE );
01887             }
01888       }
01889 
01890       // not involved
01891       return( FALSE );
01892 }
01893 
01894 
01895 BOOLEAN PlayerGroupInvolvedInThisCombat( GROUP *pGroup )
01896 {
01897       Assert( pGroup );
01898 
01899       // player group, non-empty, not between sectors, in the right sector, isn't a group of in transit, dead, or POW mercs,
01900       // and either not the helicopter group, or the heli is on the ground
01901       if( pGroup->fPlayer && pGroup->ubGroupSize &&
01902                   !pGroup->fBetweenSectors &&
01903                   !GroupHasInTransitDeadOrPOWMercs( pGroup ) &&
01904                   ( !IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( pGroup ) || !fHelicopterIsAirBorne ) )
01905       {
01906             if ( CurrentBattleSectorIs( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, pGroup->ubSectorZ ) )
01907             {
01908                   // involved
01909                   return( TRUE );
01910             }
01911       }
01912 
01913       // not involved
01914       return( FALSE );
01915 }
01916 
01917 
01918 BOOLEAN CurrentBattleSectorIs( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ )
01919 {
01920       INT16 sBattleSectorX, sBattleSectorY, sBattleSectorZ;
01921       BOOLEAN fSuccess;
01922 
01923       fSuccess = GetCurrentBattleSectorXYZ( &sBattleSectorX, &sBattleSectorY, &sBattleSectorZ );
01924       Assert( fSuccess );
01925 
01926       if ( ( sSectorX == sBattleSectorX ) && ( sSectorY == sBattleSectorY ) && ( sSectorZ == sBattleSectorZ ) )
01927       {
01928             // yup!
01929             return( TRUE );
01930       }
01931       else
01932       {
01933             // wrong sector, no battle here
01934             return( FALSE );
01935       }
01936 }

01938 
01939 
01940 void CheckForRobotAndIfItsControlled( void )
01941 {
01942       INT32 i;
01943 
01944       // search for the robot on player's team
01945       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01946       {
01947             if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife && AM_A_ROBOT( MercPtrs[ i ] ))
01948             {
01949                   // check whether it has a valid controller with it. This sets its ubRobotRemoteHolderID field.
01950                   UpdateRobotControllerGivenRobot( MercPtrs[ i ] );
01951 
01952                   // if he has a controller, set controllers 
01953                   if ( MercPtrs[ i ]->ubRobotRemoteHolderID != NOBODY )
01954                   {
01955                         UpdateRobotControllerGivenController( MercPtrs[ MercPtrs[ i ]->ubRobotRemoteHolderID ] );
01956                   }
01957 
01958                   break;
01959             }
01960       }
01961 }
01962 
01963 void LogBattleResults( UINT8 ubVictoryCode)
01964 {
01965       INT16 sSectorX, sSectorY, sSectorZ;
01966       GetCurrentBattleSectorXYZ( &sSectorX, &sSectorY, &sSectorZ );
01967       if( ubVictoryCode == LOG_VICTORY )
01968       {
01969             switch( gubEnemyEncounterCode )
01970             {
01971                   case ENEMY_INVASION_CODE:
01972                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_DEFENDEDTOWNSECTOR, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), sSectorX, sSectorY );
01973                         break;
01974                   case ENEMY_ENCOUNTER_CODE:
01975                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_WONBATTLE, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), sSectorX, sSectorY );
01976                         break;
01977                   case ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE:
01978                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_WIPEDOUTENEMYAMBUSH, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), sSectorX, sSectorY );
01979                         break;
01980                   case ENTERING_ENEMY_SECTOR_CODE:
01981                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_SUCCESSFULATTACK, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), sSectorX, sSectorY );
01982                         break;
01983                   case CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE:
01984                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_CREATURESATTACKED, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), sSectorX, sSectorY );
01985                         break;
01986                   case BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE:
01987                   case ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE:
01988                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_SLAUGHTEREDBLOODCATS, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), sSectorX, sSectorY );
01989                         break;
01990             }
01991       }
01992       else
01993       {
01994             switch( gubEnemyEncounterCode )
01995             {
01996                   case ENEMY_INVASION_CODE:
01997                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_LOSTTOWNSECTOR, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), sSectorX, sSectorY );
01998                         break;
01999                   case ENEMY_ENCOUNTER_CODE:
02000                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_LOSTBATTLE, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), sSectorX, sSectorY );
02001                         break;
02002                   case ENEMY_AMBUSH_CODE:
02003                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_FATALAMBUSH, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), sSectorX, sSectorY );
02004                         break;
02005                   case ENTERING_ENEMY_SECTOR_CODE:
02006                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_UNSUCCESSFULATTACK, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), sSectorX, sSectorY );
02007                         break;
02008                   case CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE:
02009                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_CREATURESATTACKED, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), sSectorX, sSectorY );
02010                         break;
02011                   case BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE:
02012                   case ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE:
02013                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_KILLEDBYBLOODCATS, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), sSectorX, sSectorY );
02014                         break;
02015             }
02016       }
02017 }
02018 
02019 void HandlePreBattleInterfaceStates()
02020 {
02021       if( gfEnteringMapScreenToEnterPreBattleInterface && !gfEnteringMapScreen )
02022       {
02023             gfEnteringMapScreenToEnterPreBattleInterface = FALSE;
02024             if( !gfUsePersistantPBI )
02025             {
02026                   InitPreBattleInterface( NULL, FALSE );
02027                   gfUsePersistantPBI = TRUE;
02028             }
02029             else
02030             {
02031                   InitPreBattleInterface( gpBattleGroup, TRUE );
02032             }
02033       }
02034       else if( gfDelayAutoResolveStart && gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
02035       {
02036             gfDelayAutoResolveStart = FALSE;
02037             gfAutomaticallyStartAutoResolve = TRUE;
02038       }
02039       else if( gfAutomaticallyStartAutoResolve )
02040       {
02041             gfAutomaticallyStartAutoResolve = FALSE;
02042             ActivateAutomaticAutoResolveStart();
02043       }
02044       else if( gfTransitionMapscreenToAutoResolve )
02045       {
02046             gfTransitionMapscreenToAutoResolve = FALSE;
02047       }
02048 }
